5.  Explain the contraception objection to Marquis’s argument and his
response. Is his response adequate? Why or why not?
6.  How could Thomson respond to Marquis’s argument. Is her best response
good enough? Why or why not?
7.  Determine whether you think abortion is morally wrong in the following
cases:
